directions.step:
Place carrots and apple juice in medium nonstick skillet. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer 7 to 9 minutes or until carrots are crisp-tender. Uncover; cook over medium heat until liquid evaporates. Stir in jelly and mustard; cook and stir over medium heat until jelly melts and carrots are glazed. Source: Fast & Healthy Magazine.
